price: 49. Ma sugayaan (gaaladu) wax kale aan aheyn hal Qaylo9, qabaneysa iyagoo murmi.
arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ
footnotes: 9. Erey ahaan macnaha waa dhawaaq ama qeylo daran, waxaana loola jeedaa afuufka koowaad ee Buunka uu dhiman noole kasta oo dhulka jooga digniin hore la’aan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūna
